extension.name: Reflection Field
extension.description: Populate this field's value using values from other fields in the same entry. Uses XPath and optionally XSLT.

releases.release: - Allow reflection field to recalculate data when field is toggled from publish indexes - Fix issue when an installation has no Utilities
- Force tables to be created with the MyISAM table engine.
- Fixed a sanitisation issue on publish pages. - Made compatible with Symphony 2.2.
- Bug with usage of appendFormattedElement fixed by michael-e.
- Some bug fixes and code cleanup.
- Fixed column sorting issues. - Added more filter modes.
- Added a search: filter method to allow you to use boolean type searching.
- Fixed a number of possible encoding issues.
